name: Fungeon Crawler
description:
Fungeon Crawler was made in Unity 3D in 48 hours, and took 1st place at the Wilmington University East Coast Reboot Game Jam of 2015. The theme for the Game Jam was "Oxymoron" hence we made a Fun Dungeon, a "Fungeon".

The game itself is a 3D randomly generated Dungeon Crawler. Where you are a robot named Logic who throws his heart out to attack. You must work your way through the Dungeons and defeat the final boss to be crowned victor of the Fungeon!

This specific version was done in 48 hours.
